availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nehemiah Rozel (Grant County, Kentucky, laborer and soldier (11th KY Cav, USA))

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, laborer and soldier. Ohio native. Married to Matilda Rozel. Father of Elizabeth Rozel, James Rozel, Joseph Rozel, William Rozel, and John Rozel. Laborer in Boone County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Grant County in 1862. Served in the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a wagoner and private from September 22, 1862 to September 19, 1864. Reported as deserted from Lexington on September 19, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, District 2, p. 223A-B.
